com.loaderapp.tools.Browser
Class BrowserFiltersFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.loaderapp.tools.Browser.BrowserFiltersFactory

public class BrowserFiltersFactory
extends java.lang.Object

This class creates a FileFilter with the aid of an array of Strings whicih contains the wanted extensions to filter. Default extensions are provided in BrowserFilters

Version:
1.0
Author:
Steven Rosato

Method Detail

createFilter

public static javax.swing.filechooser.FileFilter createFilter(java.lang.String filterTitle,
                                                              java.lang.String... extensions)
Creates the FileFilter with the given extensions provided. A title must be assigned as well; it is the one which will be shown in the FileChooser.

Parameters:
filterTitle - The Filter's title
extensions - The extensions, see BrowserFilters for default Filters
Returns:
FileFilter The FileFilter
